title: Seven
description: DEVASTATIONMoving back home wasn't anything I ever wanted. But after enduring the worst,Going home was the only answer.Being back is everything I thought it would be...Awful, isolating, a constant reminder of what I lost. And the last thing I need--or want--is another reminder of my past,Especially Bryant Wood. GUILTThat's all I feel--all I can see when I look at Savannah Turner.I want to hold her, feel her, love her,And thank her for what's she given me.But I can't show her the gratitude.The relief.The gift she's given me.I won't.It'll ruin everything.A secret I must keep--a secret that could break her. Shatter her.Destroy her.All over again.
author: Susan   Renee
